Package org.ejbca.core.model.era

Class RaMasterApiSessionBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ejbca.core.model.era.RaMasterApiSessionBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RaMasterApi, RaMasterApiSessionLocal
    public class RaMasterApiSessionBean
extends Object
implements RaMasterApiSessionLocal
    Implementation of the RaMasterApi that invokes functions at the local node.
    Version:
    $Id: RaMasterApiSessionBean.java 34207 2020-01-08 13:22:50Z samuellb $

      • getApiVersion

        public int getApiVersion()
        Description copied from interface: RaMasterApi
        Get the current (lowest) back-end API version. Note that this will not lead to a request over network since peers (if any) will report their API version when connecting and this will return the cached and current number.
        Specified by:
        getApiVersion in interface RaMasterApi
        Returns:
        the current (lowest) back-end API version

      • isAuthorizedNoLogging

        public boolean isAuthorizedNoLogging​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
                                     String... resources)
        Description copied from interface: RaMasterApi
        The AuthenticationToken is preliminary authorized to a resource if it is either 1. authorized by the local system 2. authorized by the remote system(s) The local authorization system is always checked first and authorization is cached separately for local and remote system. Since actual authorization check is performed during API call, a local override can never harm the remote system.
        Specified by:
        isAuthorizedNoLogging in interface RaMasterApi
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - auth
        resources - resource
        Returns:
        true if the authenticationToken is authorized to all the resources

      • getAvailableCustomRaStyles

        public List<RaStyleInfo> getAvailableCustomRaStyles​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
                                                    int hashCodeOfCurrentList)
        Description copied from interface: RaMasterApi
        Returns a list of all style archives associated to roles which the requesting administrator is member of.
        Specified by:
        getAvailableCustomRaStyles in interface RaMasterApi
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - of the requesting administrator
        hashCodeOfCurrentList - will be compared with RaStyleInfos. If equal, null is returned to avoid heavy network traffic. Set 0 to ignore.
        Returns:
        list of associated style archives. Empty list if administrator is not a member of any role or if role has no custom styles applied. Null if hashCodeOfCurrentList matched, hence doesn't require an update

      • saveRole

        public Role saveRole​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
                     Role role)
              throws AuthorizationDeniedException,
                     RoleExistsException
        Description copied from interface: RaMasterApi
        Adds or updates a role in the database. If the role has an ID, it will be updated, but only on the system where it exists. Otherwise, this method will try to create it on any of the configured systems.
        Specified by:
        saveRole in interface RaMasterApi
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - Admin
        role - Role to persist. The roleId controls whether it should be added or updated.
        Returns:
        The role object if the role was added/updated, otherwise null.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if unauthorized to update this role, or not authorized on any system to add it.
        RoleExistsException - if a role with the given name already exists (can happen when adding or renaming)

        roleId - ID of role to delete.
        Returns:

      • extendApprovalRequest

        public void extendApprovalRequest​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
                                  int id,
                                  long extendForMillis)
                           throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Description copied from interface: RaMasterApi
        Extends the validity of an approval request for the given amount of time. The status is set to Waiting for Approval if it was expired.
        Specified by:
        extendApprovalRequest in interface RaMasterApi
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - Admin
        id - Id of approval request
        extendForMillis - Milliseconds to extend the validity for
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - If the admin does not have approval access to this request, e.g. due to missing access to CAs or missing approval access.

      • addRequestResponse

        public boolean addRequestResponse​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
                                  RaApprovalResponseRequest requestResponse)
                           throws AuthorizationDeniedException,
                                  ApprovalException,
                                  ApprovalRequestExpiredException,
                                  ApprovalRequestExecutionException,
                                  AdminAlreadyApprovedRequestException,
                                  SelfApprovalException,
                                  AuthenticationFailedException
        Description copied from interface: RaMasterApi
        Approves, rejects or saves (not yet implemented) a step of an approval request. The action is determined by the "action" value in the given RaApprovalResponseRequest.
        Specified by:
        addRequestResponse in interface RaMasterApi
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - auth
        requestResponse - resp
        Returns:
        true if the approval request exists on this node, false if not.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - authy
        ApprovalException - is thrown for other errors, such as the approval being in the wrong state, etc.
        ApprovalRequestExpiredException - if the approval request is older than the configured expiry time
        ApprovalRequestExecutionException - if execution of the approval request (e.g. adding an end endity) failed.
        AdminAlreadyApprovedRequestException - if this approval request has been approved or rejected already.
        SelfApprovalException - if trying to approve one's own action.
        AuthenticationFailedException - if the authentication token couldn't be validated

                      throws AuthorizationDeniedException,
                             EndEntityProfileValidationException,
                             EndEntityExistsException,
                             WaitingForApprovalException,
                             CADoesntExistsException,
                             IllegalNameException,
                             CertificateSerialNumberException,
                             EjbcaException
        Description copied from interface: RaMasterApi
        addUserFromWS is called from EjbcaWS if profile specifies merge data from profile to user we merge them before calling addUser
        Specified by:
        addUserFromWS in interface RaMasterApi
        Parameters:
        admin - the administrator performing the action
        userDataVOWS - a UserDataVOWS object from WS

        EndEntityProfileValidationException - if data doesn't fulfill requirements of end entity profile
        EndEntityExistsException - if user already exists or some other database error occur during commit

        CADoesntExistsException - if the caid of the user does not exist
        IllegalNameException - if the Subject DN failed constraints
        CertificateSerialNumberException - if SubjectDN serial number already exists.
        CustomFieldException - if the end entity was not validated by a locally defined field validator
        ApprovalException - if an approval already exists for this request.

      • finishUserAfterLocalKeyRecovery

        public void finishUserAfterLocalKeyRecovery​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
                                            String username,
                                            String password)
                                     throws AuthorizationDeniedException,
                                            EjbcaException
        Description copied from interface: RaMasterApi
        Performs a finishUser operation after a key recovery operation. The end entity must be in NEW or KEYRECOVERY status and the admin must have access to the CA of the end entity and key recovery access to the end entity profile. In detail this means: Decrements the issue counter for an end entity, and sets the status to GENERATED when it reaches zero. Usually this counter only goes from 1 to 0, so usually this method calls means "set end entity status to GENERATED". When the status is set to GENERATED the password is also cleared.
        Specified by:
        finishUserAfterLocalKeyRecovery in interface RaMasterApi
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - authentication token
        username - username of end entity
        password - password of end entity
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if not authorized to perform key recovery for the given end entity
        EjbcaException - if the user was not found or had the wrong status

      • generateKeyStore

        public byte[] generateKeyStore​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                               EndEntityInformation endEntity)
                        throws AuthorizationDeniedException,
                               EjbcaException
        Description copied from interface: RaMasterApi
        Generates keystore for the specified end entity. Used for server side generated key pairs. It can be of PKCS12 or JKS type. Keystore can be loaded with: KeyStore ks = KeyStore.getInstance(endEntityInformation.getTokenType() == EndEntityConstants.TOKEN_SOFT_P12 ? "PKCS12" : "JKS"); ks.load(new ByteArrayInputStream(keystoreAsByteArray), endEntityInformation.getPassword().toCharArray()); Note that endEntityInformation are still needed to load a keystore.
        Specified by:
        generateKeyStore in interface RaMasterApi
        Parameters:
        admin - authentication token
        endEntity - holds end entity information (including user's password)
        Returns:
        generated keystore
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - fail
        EjbcaException - if an EJBCA exception with an error code has occurred during the process

                                  int requestType,

                                  String responseType)
                           throws AuthorizationDeniedException,
                                  ApprovalException,
                                  EjbcaException,
                                  EndEntityProfileValidationException

        Generates a certificate. This variant is used from the Web Service interface.

        userdata - end entity information, encoded as a UserDataVOWS (web service value object). Must have been enriched by the WS setUserDataVOWS/enrichUserDataWithRawSubjectDn methods.

                          X509Certificate cert,
                          String username,
                          String password,
                          byte[] requestBody)
                   throws NoSuchAliasException,
                          CADoesntExistsException,
                          CertificateCreateException,
                          CertificateRenewalException,
                          AuthenticationFailedException
        Description copied from interface: RaMasterApi
        Dispatch EST request over RaMasterApi. Basic ASN.1 validation is performed at a proxy to increase the protection of a CA slightly.
        Specified by:
        estDispatch in interface RaMasterApi
        Parameters:
        operation - the EST operation to perform
        alias - the requested CA configuration that should handle the request.
        cert - The client certificate used to request this operation if any
        username - The authentication username if any
        password - The authentication password if any
        requestBody - The HTTP request body. Usually a PKCS#10
        Returns:
        the HTTP response body
        Throws:
        NoSuchAliasException - if the alias doesn't exist
        CADoesntExistsException - if the CA specified in a request for CA certs doesn't exist
        CertificateCreateException - if an error was encountered when trying to enroll
        CertificateRenewalException - if an error was encountered when trying to re-enroll
        AuthenticationFailedException - if request was sent in without an authenticating certificate, or the username/password combo was invalid (depending on authentication method). see org.ejbca.core.protocol.est.EstOperationsSessionRemote

                                                                      long days,
                                                                      int maxNumberOfResults,
                                                                      int offset)
                                                               throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Description copied from interface: RaMasterApi
        Fetches a list of up to maxNumberOfResults certificates which expires within the next days days, ignoring the first offset certificates.

        Note: the whole certificate chain is returned.

        Authorization requirements:

         - /administrator
 - /ra_functionality/view_end_entity
 - /endentityprofilesrules/<end entity profile>/view_end_entity
 - /ca/<ca of user>
        Specified by:
        getCertificatesByExpirationTime in interface RaMasterApi
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - an authentication token used for access control
        days - the maximum number of days before the certificates expire
        maxNumberOfResults - the maximum number of returned certificates
        offset - offset
        Returns:
        a collection of certificate wrappers, never null
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if the calling user is not authorized to fetch one of the certificates

        UserDoesntFullfillEndEntityProfile - fail
        NotFoundException - fail
        ApprovalException - fail
        EjbcaException - fail
        WaitingForApprovalException - fail
        SignRequestException - fail
        CertificateExpiredException - fail
        CesecoreException - fail

      • getCaaIdentities

        public HashSet<String> getCaaIdentities​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
                                        int caId)
                                 throws AuthorizationDeniedException,
                                        CADoesntExistsException
        Description copied from interface: RaMasterApi
        Retrieves a set of all CAA identities for a CA, based on the CAA validators enabled. An empty set of CAA identities are returned if no CAA validators are enabled.
        Specified by:
        getCaaIdentities in interface RaMasterApi
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - token
        caId - ID
        Returns:
        a set of CAA identities, never null
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if authorisation was denied to the CA with the given id
        CADoesntExistsException - if there is no CA with the given id

      • addUserAndGenerateKeyStore

        public byte[] addUserAndGenerateKeyStore​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
                                         EndEntityInformation endEntity,
                                         boolean clearpwd)
                                  throws AuthorizationDeniedException,
                                         EjbcaException,
                                         WaitingForApprovalException
        Description copied from interface: RaMasterApi
        Adds (end entity) user and generates keystore for this end entity. Used to enroll certificate from RA. It can be of PKCS12 or JKS type. Keystore can be loaded with: KeyStore ks = KeyStore.getInstance(endEntityInformation.getTokenType() == EndEntityConstants.TOKEN_SOFT_P12 ? "PKCS12" : "JKS"); ks.load(new ByteArrayInputStream(keystoreAsByteArray), endEntityInformation.getPassword().toCharArray());
        Specified by:
        addUserAndGenerateKeyStore in interface RaMasterApi
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - authentication token
        endEntity - end entity data as EndEntityInformation object
        clearpwd - should password be stored in clear way(true) or hashed (false)
        Returns:
        generated keystore. If the provided data is invalid, then this can in certain cases be null.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - fail
        EjbcaException - if an EJBCA exception with an error code has occurred during the process
        WaitingForApprovalException - if approval is required to finalize the adding of the end entity

      • addUserAndCreateCertificate

        public byte[] addUserAndCreateCertificate​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
                                          EndEntityInformation endEntityInformation,
                                          boolean clearpwd)
                                   throws AuthorizationDeniedException,
                                          EjbcaException,
                                          WaitingForApprovalException
        Description copied from interface: RaMasterApi
        Adds (end entity) user and generates certificate from CSR for this end entity. Used for client side generated key pairs.
        Specified by:
        addUserAndCreateCertificate in interface RaMasterApi
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - authentication token
        endEntityInformation - end entity information. CertificateRequest (CSR) must be set under extendedInformation of the endEntityInformation.
        clearpwd - should password be stored in clear way(true) or hashed (false)
        Returns:
        certificate binary data. If the certificate request is invalid, then this can in certain cases be null.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - fail
        EjbcaException - if an EJBCA exception with an error code has occurred during the process
        WaitingForApprovalException - fail
